Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Minor
b) Defect Observed: Brake system pressure decay. Issue identified during pre-flight checks.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Vibration induced loosening of mechanical fasteners
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Steering Control component. Functional
testing confirmed the reported anomaly.
c) Remedial Measures Revise maintenance procedure to include additional verification steps
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Update technical documentation with lessons learned
d) Attributable Code: D - Due to features inherent in the design
Remarks: Investigation completed as per established procedures. All findings documented.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Design review completed. No design modification required. Component replacement as per maintenance manual is adequate.
Date: 06/10/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Gp Capt N.R. Kumar
